attributes.action: Extend the Kaupthing Edge protection to Kaupthing Isle Of Man savers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: While the Kaupthing Edge UK accounts are fully protected, UK subjects with money in the Kaupthing Isle of Man are not. We would like the protection given to the UK subsidiaries also to the Isle of Man subsidiary.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
